verses.verse: A <S%H7892>Song<s%> of <S%H4609>degrees<s%> of <S%H1732>David.<s%> <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> my <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1361>haughty,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H7311>lofty:<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> do I <S%H1980>exercise<s%> myself in great <S%H1419>matters,<s%> or in things too <S%H6381>high<s%> <S%H4480>for<s%> me.

Surely <S%H518><s%> <S%H3808><s%> I have <S%H7737>behaved<s%> and <S%H1826>quieted<s%> <S%H5315>myself,<s%> as a child that is <S%H1580>weaned<s%> <S%H5921>of<s%> his <S%H517>mother:<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> is even as a weaned <S%H1580>child.<s%>
